subject: Re: [junit] Testing several implementation of same interface
msgSnippet: Hello All, I was just wondering if there is a frame-work or tool that generates tests from an xml descriptor. Not classes with empty test-method but
messageBody:
Hello All,

I was just wondering if there is a frame-work or tool that generates tests
from an xml descriptor. Not classes with empty test-method but test-classes
with filled test-methods.

thanx for any reactions and keep up the good work

Dennis
